You say that as if it'll be the first thing they read.  More likely 
our whining will be the first thing they read and we should shut up, 
but it's not the battles that are important.  It's WHY are they 
fighting to start with.  I mean Star Wars more than any other movie I 
know of ignores the rule of running out of ammo (don't talk about Ob-
Wan in the Phantom Menace his lightsaber short circuited, not ran 
low), but it's a mega hit.  Besides I want to get Mainframe to make 
this rpg into a cartoon, and they don't want to have to sort threw 
all these OOCs.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Quickstrk7@a... wrote:

want to

trying to

RPG and

even just

some immature

an adult
